<<<<<<< HEAD Pan Seared Scallops /recipes/seafood_scallops/ Tue, 31 Dec 2019 00:00:00 +0000
/recipes/seafood_scallops/ Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add scallops and season the tops with black pepper. Cook 2 minutes, until golden brown. Flip with spatula and cook 2 more minutes, until second side is golden brown. Add soy sauce mixture to pan and bring to a simmer, for 2 minutes, until sauce thickens and scallops are cooked through and have an opaque color. Simple and delicious!

/recipes/chinese_springroll/ Delicious and crunchy without deep frying! Ingredients Cabbage Carrot Brown mushroom Spring roll wrapper (7 inch square) Spring roll sauce Directions Shreded cabbage and carrot Stir fry them in sesame oil, don’t over cook. Add salt Stir fry sliced mushrooms with oyster sauce until soft Preheat oven to 425F Arrange spring rolls in a single layer on a medium baking sheet. Brush with vegetable oil.

/recipes/chinese_diakonpickle/ Learn how to make super easy and quick pickled daikon radishes! These pickles are so versatile that they can go with anything! Directions In a mixing bowl, toss sliced diakon with lot of salt. Cover until water is released for 2 days. Drain and rinse daikon, removing as much salt as possible. ======= >>>>>>> e2ae766308cde03cbdd6f340869c1c952b395778 Drink_Coffee /recipes/drink_coffee/ Sun, 29 Dec 2019 00:00:00 +0000
/recipes/drink_coffee/ Cold Brew Coffee is made by brewing roughly ground coffee beans in cold water for a long period of time (think 24 hours). Hot Coffee is brewed by pouring hot water over finely ground coffee in a very short period of time. Iced Coffee is simply Hot Coffee poured over ice. Cold Brwe Coffee Instructions: * Roughly ground some fresh coffee beans * Combine the coarsely-ground coffee ans cold water.
Drinks /recipes/drink_cocktail/ Sun, 29 Dec 2019 00:00:00 +0000
/recipes/drink_cocktail/ Pomegranate mojito Happy Christmas Eve!! I can’t believe today is the last post in the year 2019. Today I am going to finish with a nice, celebratory festive cocktail. This pomegranate mojito is an easy twist on a classic that tastes more complex than it is. With a delicious tartness, bright color and being so easy to make, it is perfect for any occasion. Ingredients 10 mint leaves 1 tbsp sugar 1⁄2 lime 1 1⁄2 oz white rum 45 ml 3 oz pomegranate juice 90 ml 2 oz sparkling water 60 ml Instructions * Cut the lime half into 4 wedges * Place the lime wedges, mint leaves and sugar in the bottome of a glass and muddle them together * Top up the glass with ice then pour over the rum * Add the pomegranate juice then topu up the glass with sparkling water * Stir gently to mix

/recipes/vegie_cauliflower/ Dry Pot Cauliflower is a restaurant favorite that we’ve had countless times in China. It’s our vegetable of choice when eating out. You might think it sounds boring, but we discovered that cauliflower can be amazingly delicious with a little spice, saltiness and the addition of pork belly. There is a reason why this dish is called Dry Pot Cauliflower, or 干锅菜花 (gan guo cai hua). Restaurants usually serve dishes like this in a miniature wok over a tiny chafing dish flame.
Cheese Platter /recipes/cheese/ Sat, 28 Dec 2019 00:00:00 +0000
/recipes/cheese/ Cheese is a dairy product derived from milk that is produced in a wide range of flavors, textures, and forms by coagulation of the milk protein casein. It comprises proteins and fat from milk, usually the milk of cows, buffalo, goats, or sheep. 要说火腿界的“扛把子”，非伊比利亚火腿（jamón ibérico)莫属，严格的猪种选择和饲养过程，造就了这种最适合生吃的顶级火腿。 https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/31802634 从2014年4月开始，西班牙国家标准局根据猪的品种纯度、食谱中的橡子比例、饲养方式等因素，规定了伊比利亚火腿的名称和等级。正版的伊比利亚火腿，都由伊比利亚猪的后腿制成，统称为Jamon，分为四个等级（见下图）。而前腿制成的则被称为Paleta。相比较Paleta，Jamon熟成时间长，脂肪含量高，肉质更加柔嫩丰腴。 想有比较好的体验。至少选择橡子增肥的伊比利亚黑猪火腿（Jamón Ibérico de Bellota 要想不糟践伊比利亚火腿，唯一的选择就是生吃，伊比利亚火腿作为开胃菜再好不过了。 几乎所有的西班牙餐厅或酒吧，都备有生火腿，供食客现切现吃，但是赛拉诺还是伊比利亚火腿，是bellota还是cebo，点单的时候就要看清楚了 在马德里，有几家叫做“火腿博物馆”的馆子。虽然名为博物馆，但其实是个售卖火腿、奶酪、小吃和其他餐点的连锁店，店里分为餐厅和bar，花一欧多就可以品尝到夹着一两片火腿的三明治，丰俭由
Salted Duck /recipes/meat_saltedduck/ Sat, 28 Dec 2019 00:00:00 +0000
/recipes/meat_saltedduck/ Salted Duck Nanjing Salted Duck has over 2000 years of history. It looks plain, but is packed with flavor. You’ll need: one whole 4 – 4 ½ pound duck 4 tablespoons salt (1/3 cup) 2 ½ tablespoons Sichuan peppercorns (half 1/3 cup) 4 star anise 3 bay leaves 1 cinnamon stick 5 slices ginger 3 scallions, cut into large segments 1/2 cup Shaoxing wine Directions: Rinse the duck thoroughly under cold water, discarding any of the giblets that came with it.

/recipes/seafood_paella/ Seafood Paella This is the dramatic seafood paella that looks stunning. You can vary the quantities of seafood and also use crab, or lobster (boil them separately). Andresito, who is collecting reminiscences of people in villages around him in Alicante, told me that on the Alicante Coast, fishermen’s families made seafood paellas without any vegetables. /recipes/chinese_beeftendon/ Stew Beef Tendon 2018-11-18 No Comments The beef tendons are used as an ingredient in some Asian cuisines. Tendon is tough and fibrous, but becomes soft after a long period of cooking. It contains large amounts of collagen and after boiling or stewing, it is sometimes described as mimicking the mouthfeel of high-fat cuts of beef despite its low fat content. Cook beef tendon in a pressure cooker for 90 mins with cooking wine, soy sauce, green onion, giner etc

/recipes/dessert_fruits/ I like to begin the platter with a base of ripe, colorful, sliced melons and pineapple–for example, cantaloupe, honeydew, Galia, or Cavaillon melons, plus the new “golden” pineapples. Peel the outside of a whole melon, cut it in half through the stem end, and scoop out the seeds. Place the melon halves cut side down on a board, and slice them straight across into 1⁄2-inch-thick slices. Fan each half-melon out slightly and arrange it on the platter.

Vegie_WoodEarSalad /recipes/vegie_woodearsalad/ Fri, 13 Dec 2019 10:02:50 -0600
/recipes/vegie_woodearsalad/ The Woks of Life Wood Ear Mushroom Salad 凉拌木耳 Well, you don’t see this dish everyday! It’s weird-looking and not particularly appealing at first glance, but this wood ear mushroom salad dish is literally on every menu in China. I wouldn’t have dared to share this Wood Ear Mushroom Salad recipe a few years back, as very few people outside of Asia know what this ingredient is. But now that we’ve included wood ears in many of our popular recipes from the past few years–like Moo Shu Pork, Moo Shu Chicken, and Chicken with Garlic Sauce–we’re going whole hog on you all with this delicious wood ear appetizer.

When well cooked, eggplant is my first choice over any type of meats. In summer days, young and fresh eggplants are almost everywhere in the market. Braised Sea Cucumber With Fish Maw (焖海参花胶) is a very simple dish that every Chinese family can relate and enjoy. It is not only flavourful but also has high nutritional value. Sea cucumber with its gelatinous texture is a delicacy in Chinese cuisines. It is believed to help to prevent aging. Fish maw and pork tendons, on the other hand are a good source of collagen as they improve blood circulation, complexion and heal wound after an operation.

Lotus Root 2018-12-27 No Comments Lotus root is one of my favorite vegetables. 原料：莲藕1节（约250克） 红椒半个 小青椒2个 大葱1节 姜1小块 大蒜1瓣 调料：醋1汤匙 白糖2茶匙（10克） 盐1/4茶匙（1克） 味精1/4茶匙（1克） 花椒15颗 油4汤匙（60ml） 做法： 1）将莲藕削去外皮，切成薄片泡在清水中。大葱，姜，蒜都切成细丝。红椒切丝，小青椒切片。 2）锅中倒入清水，大火煮开后放入莲藕片焯烫半分钟后捞出，放入冷水中浸泡，待冷却后捞出沥干，摆入盘中。调入醋，白糖，盐，味精，葱姜蒜丝，红椒丝和小青椒片。 3）食用油倒入汤勺中，放入花椒，开小火将油烧热，待花椒变成深荔枝皮色，油有点点冒烟时，把火关掉。将花椒油淋在菜上即可。吃前，记得搅拌均匀。

Dessert_CheeseCake /recipes/dessert_cheesecake/ Thu, 12 Dec 2019 08:44:29 -0600
/recipes/dessert_cheesecake/ Mini Cheesecake 2019-08-26 No Comments Ingredients For the Crust: 1 1/2 cups graham cracker crumbsfrom 12 whole crackers* 6 Tbsp unsalted butter, melted 1/2 tsp cinnamon For the Mini Cheesecakes: 16 oz cream cheese from two 8oz packages, softened 3 large eggs room temperature 14 oz sweetened condensed milk Topping Ingredients: 1 cup caramel sauce 1 cup heavy whipping cream chilled 1 Tbsp granulated sugar 1/2 tsp vanilla extract 1/4 tsp cinnamon to garnish optional **Cooks Tip: Mixing the condensed milk on LOW speed helps knock out excess air bubbles which can cause the cheesecakes to crack.
Appertizer - Salsa /recipes/appertizer_salsa/ Sun, 08 Dec 2019 20:57:40 -0600
/recipes/appertizer_salsa/ Salsa is the Spanish word for “sauce”. In English, especially in the United States, when the word “salsa” is used in an unqualified manner, it refers to the spicy tomato-and-chili-based preparation known as salsa roja, salsa picante or salsa cruda, as adopted from Mexican cuisine. Homemade salsa is not only delicious, it’s very quick and easy to make! I never buy it from a grocery store. It tastes incredibly fresh which tangy tomatoes, onions and hints of lime, cilantro and cumin.
Appertizer - Guacamole /recipes/appertizer_guacamole/ Sun, 08 Dec 2019 20:50:13 -0600
/recipes/appertizer_guacamole/ Guacamole is an avocado-based dip, spread, or salad first developed by the Aztecs in present-day Mexico. In addition to its use in modern Mexican cuisine, it has become part of international and American cuisine as a dip, condiment and salad ingredient. It is easy to make, naturally gluten-free and vegan, and always the hit of a party. Note: Avocados must be riped. Of course, there are a million ways to use put this guacamole recipe to delicious use as well.
Seafood - Shrimp /recipes/seafood_shrimp/ Sun, 08 Dec 2019 20:40:55 -0600
/recipes/seafood_shrimp/ Presentation is more important than eating for me! I bought the jumbo size white tiger frozen shrimps from Costco, then just simply grill them on Weber grill and assemble them in a plate. Marinate defrost shrimps with salt, pepper, and olive oil before pan-fry them. My friend made the shrimp ball soup which is also very delicious.
Two Layer Cake /recipes/dessert_twolayercake/ Sun, 08 Dec 2019 19:33:26 -0600
/recipes/dessert_twolayercake/ Ingredients: 10 eggs 2 x half cup of sugar 2 tablespoon of vegetable oil 1⁄2 cup of milk 1 cup of Swans cake flour 1⁄2 teaspoon of cream of tarter 1⁄2 teaspoon baking powder Parchment paper Cooking racks Icing knife Frosting: 3 cups of heavy cream 1⁄4 cup confectioners sugar 1⁄2 teaspoon vanilla Beat cream until it begins to thicken; add sugar gradually, add vanilla, Until cream holds its shape when the beater is raised
All About Salad /recipes/salad/ Fri, 06 Dec 2019 13:48:24 -0600
/recipes/salad/ Napa Cabbage Salad Sweet pepper, green onion, lettuce, reddish, daikon, and cucumber Salt, white vinegar, sugar, and water Found this recipe in a New York supermarket. This is a Chinese recipe. People like it during the hot summer days. Despite only containing a handful of ingredients, it offers so much in texture, flavor, and contrast. It is elegant and refined, yet simple, approachable, and effortless. The sweetness of the oranges, the earthy beets, the creamy, satiating avocado chunks, and crunch of toasted hazelnuts come together to create one impressive beet salad.

Soup_Homemade /recipes/soup_homemade/ Mon, 25 Nov 2019 14:06:20 -0600
/recipes/soup_homemade/ I always like soup so I always like to make soup by myself. Because in this way, I will know what ingredients are in my soup. I try to not use high fat items in soup, such as cream, butter etc. My soup is always light with less salt too. Fish Maw Soup Made this soup with canned sweet corn, fish maw, and egg white. Fish maw is a good source of collagen, which is vital in healthy skin beauty in all age group of either gender.
Drink_Homemade /recipes/drink_homemade/ Mon, 25 Nov 2019 13:52:08 -0600
/recipes/drink_homemade/ Simple homemade drink without sugar. Can add honey if you have a sweet tooth. This time I added some turmeric powder. Turmeric, sometimes called Indian saffron or the golden spice. Positive side effects While turmeric is a spice, it has also traditionally been used in Chinese medicine to treat inflammatory conditions, skin diseases, wounds, digestive,and liver conditions. Anti-inflammatory properties The Arthritis Foundation cites several studies in which turmeric has reduced inflammation.

/recipes/porridge/ Congee is a type of rice porridge that is popular in many Asian countries, especially East Asia. When eaten as plain rice congee, it is most often served with side dishes. Pumpkin porridge Sweet potato porridge Taro and purple rice porridge Green bean, red bean, and black bean porridge. Good for hot and humid summer to get rid of wetness from your body. Pressure cook for 2 hours.
